mapper.select: select * from board order by bo_num desc limit #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.perPageNum}
mapper.update: update board set bo_views = bo_views+1 where bo_num = #{bo_num}
mapper.insert: insert into board(bo_num, bo_ori_num, bo_title, bo_contents, bo_me_id) select ifnull(max(bo_num),0)+1, ifnull(max(bo_num),0)+1, #{board.bo_title}, #{board.bo_contents}, #{board.bo_me_id} from board
mapper.update: update board set bo_title = #{board.bo_title}, bo_contents = #{board.bo_contents}, bo_up_date = now() where bo_num = #{board.bo_num}
mapper.insert: insert into file(fi_name, fi_ori_name, fi_bo_num) value(#{file.fi_name}, #{file.fi_ori_name}, #{file.fi_bo_num})
